name: Andrzej Ito
profile_summary: As a Senior Sales Engineer with over 9 years of experience, I excel in **Sales**, **Account Management**, and **Stakeholder Management**, ensuring effective communication and collaboration across teams. I have a proven track record in **Process Improvement**, leveraging **CRM** and **ERP** systems, including **Salesforce** and **SAP**, to enhance operational efficiency and drive sales growth. My analytical skills enable me to derive market intelligence and deliver strategic insights, while my cultural sensitivity fosters positive relationships with diverse clientele. Additionally, I have a history of mentoring junior engineers and leading cross-functional teams, delivering impactful projects that prioritize user experience, performance, and innovation.

experience.responsibilities:
- Utilize strong **Sales** acumen to effectively communicate with stakeholders and enhance client relationship management through **CRM** tools.
- Implement **Process Improvement** strategies to streamline operations and increase sales efficiency.
- Analyze market trends using **Market Intelligence** to inform sales strategies and predict customer needs.
- Leverage **Salesforce** and **SAP** for effective account management and client engagement.
- Collaborate with teams to execute account strategies effectively while maintaining **cultural sensitivity** in diverse environments.
- Utilize excellent communication skills to present technical concepts to non-technical stakeholders, driving understanding and collaboration.
- Contribute analytical insights to the overall sales process, improving overall revenue and market penetration.
- Lead the development of key services within **Java** cloud-based applications, focusing on **Microservices Architecture** and **REST API** design.
- Designed and developed a Hybrid-single Page Application using **Java**, **Spring Boot**, **React 17**, and **Redux 4.2.1**.
- Enhanced the React Observables with **Redux**, **React-router**, and **Redux-thunk** to improve application performance.
- Developed user interface by utilizing **React HOC**, **Flux/Redux** for SPA development.
- Worked on the UI layer using **Angular 14**, **HTML5**, **CSS**, and **Bootstrap** to build rich, flexible, and user-interactive web pages.
- Hands-on experience with **Core Java** including **Multithreading**, **Concurrency**, **File Handling I/O**, **Generics**, **Data Structures and Collections**, and **Garbage Collection**.
- Used **Node.js**, **MongoDB**, and **npm** for installing dependencies to run applications in a web server in a staging environment. 
- Experienced with RDBMS implementation and development using **Oracle**, **MySQL**, **MS SQL**, and **PostgreSQL**.
- Automated **Docker** image deployment to development/frequency testing and production environments using **Jenkins** and **Ansible**, enhancing deployment efficiency by **30%**.

- Developed and maintained strong **CRM** systems to enhance account management and improve sales process efficiency.
- Utilized analytical skills to drive process improvement and optimize sales strategies based on market intelligence data.
- Managed key stakeholder relationships, ensuring effective communication and cultural sensitivity to meet client needs.
- Leveraged **Salesforce** and **SAP** platforms for streamlined account management and sales tracking, contributing to a **15%** increase in overall sales performance.
- Conducted regular training sessions, enhancing team communication skills, resulting in a **10%** improvement in client engagement metrics.
- Analyzed sales processes, identifying areas for enhancement that led to a **20%** improvement in operational efficiency.
- Developed comprehensive reports and dashboards using CRM tools to monitor sales metrics and drive data-driven decisions.

• Demonstrated analytical skills by utilizing **Salesforce** and **SAP** for effective **CRM** and **ERP** management, enhancing sales processes by over **20%**.
• Implemented process improvement strategies that resulted in a **15%** increase in sales team efficiency and customer satisfaction.
• Managed key stakeholder relationships through effective communication, ensuring alignment with business goals and increasing stakeholder engagement by **30%**.
• Conducted market intelligence analysis to identify new business opportunities, contributing to a revenue growth of approximately **$500K** annually.
• Leveraged experience in **process improvement** to streamline the sales pipeline, incorporating **Salesforce** analytics for enhanced performance tracking.
• Collaborated with cross-functional teams to drive cultural sensitivity initiatives, fostering an inclusive environment that improved team collaboration and morale.
